comments.body: Wow, that's really uncool that they don't specify the version of LGPL. Something to keep an eye on if they change their mind in the future.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +30,34 @@about:
    home: https://github.com/cleder/pygeoif/
    license: LGPL
    summary: A basic implementation of the __geo_interface__
